raw_body: KOTAKADENIYA – N.B.A. – Beloved husband of Kusuma,​ father of Dr Rasika,​ Udula and Subashini,​ brother of HMGB,​ Violet,​ Irangani,​ Shreyalatha,​ Chandra,​ Thilaka,​ late Ramya and Asoka,​ expired. Cortege leaves Nuwara Mal Shalawa,​ Keppetipola Road,​ Kandy at 8.30 a.m. on Saturday 27th January 2024 for Cremation at Mahaiyawa Cemetery at 9.30 a.m.       005975
